text: **WHEN DRAWN:** If there are on enemy units on the battefield that satisfy the condition required to achieve this card, you can discard this card and draw a new Secondary Mission card.
One or more **INFANTRY** units with a Starting Strength of 13+ (including Attached units) were destroyed this turn.
Each time an enemy **INFANTRY** unit with a Starting Strength of 13+ (including Attached units) is destroyed.
